column4: News;( ------Phnom Penh):------  Ministry of Water Resources and Meteorology  issued a ------weather------ warning on November 30
column5: 2018 that a low-pressure system is encompassing Cambodia
column6: which will  bring low temperatures from November 30 to December 6
column7: 2018.------ Provinces near the Dangrek Mountain Range and the Northeastern Highlands will see minimum temperatures of 21-23 ° C and maximums of 27 to 29° C.------The Ministry of Water Resources also confirmed that in other provinces
column8: the minimum will be from 23 to 25 ° C and maximum from 28-30 ° C.------Arey News------
